text: Robert Wayne Wilson (born February 18, 1934) is a Canadian retired professional ice hockey defenceman. He played in one National Hockey League game for the Chicago Black Hawks from 1953 to 1954. He was born in Sudbury, Ontario. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Chicago Blackhawks players Category:Ice hockey people from Greater Sudbury
title: Bob Wilson (ice hockey)
